item.title: Diversity Is Not All You Need: Training A Robust Cooperative Agent Needs Specialist Partners
item.description: Training robust cooperative AI agents requires diverse and specialized training partners, but existing methods often produce overfit partners. This paper proposes novel methods using reinforcement and…
